005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatTypes;
010
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.AbstractDataTypeAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IDecimalItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.EQNameFactory;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.io.IOException;
019import java.math.BigDecimal;
020import java.math.MathContext;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Support for the Metaschema <a href=
027 * "https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#decimal">decimal</a>
028 * data type.
029 */
030public class DecimalAdapter
031    extends AbstractDataTypeAdapter<BigDecimal, IDecimalItem> {
032  private static final MathContext MATH_CONTEXT = MathContext.DECIMAL64;
033  @NonNull
034  private static final List<IEnhancedQName> NAMES = ObjectUtils.notNull(
035      List.of(
036          EQNameFactory.instance().newQName(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH, "decimal")));
037
038  DecimalAdapter() {
039    super(BigDecimal.class, IDecimalItem.class, IDecimalItem::cast);
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  public List<IEnhancedQName> getNames() {
044    return NAMES;
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  public JsonFormatTypes getJsonRawType() {
049    return JsonFormatTypes.NUMBER;
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public BigDecimal parse(String value) {
054    return new BigDecimal(value, MATH_CONTEXT);
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public void writeJsonValue(Object value, JsonGenerator generator) throws IOException {
059    try {
060      generator.writeNumber((BigDecimal) value);
061    } catch (ClassCastException ex) {
062      throw new IOException(ex);
063    }
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  public BigDecimal copy(Object obj) {
068    // a BigDecimal is immutable
069    return (BigDecimal) obj;
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public IDecimalItem newItem(Object value) {
074    BigDecimal item = toValue(value);
075    return IDecimalItem.valueOf(item);
076  }
077}
